ygData.subject: Re: What a difference 10 months makes (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When I start a newbie, I always dump all the training points into combat for the first couple of levels. It makes it a lot easier, IMO, to get through the
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Jan 28/00, kim@... wrote:
>
> You have become better at hand to hand(1)
>
> Doh! After that I was punching for 7-8 instead of 1. :)

When I start a newbie, I always dump all the training points into combat
for the first couple of levels. It makes it a lot easier, IMO, to get
through the first levels quickly.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
